input: This deity descended upon Tollan with spider webs and hurled a blast of such cold wind that the townspeople were advised to go to Anahuac. input: Baptist and Methodist churches were burned in this colony in the 1830s after Anglicans blamed those groups for inciting Samuel Sharpe's rebellion. input: This painting was commissioned by the Baron de Julien, a priest who had cuckolded a bishop, and its artist took the job five years after returning from his Prix de Rome trip.
